Text: Merenhouse:  Merenhouse usually combines a rap style of singing (talk-singing) with actual singing.

Text: Merenhouse:  However, they can be combined with electronic sounds or even electronic sounds sampled from the actual instruments (musch like house music).

Text: Merenhouse:  Some merenhouse music is in a fast 2/4 beat and has typical merengue style rhythms.
